## everything you need to build the next generation of Bitcoin apps
### Developer friendly APIs that interact with Bitcoin, Ordinals, and Stacks.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ff21113877dd79ed7913b57/65157c5a73f92489b3c22538_Group%206116.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ff21113877dd79ed7913b57/64f9c988c5e8386c011817e7_Group%206072.svg)

### Trigger actions on Stacks and Bitcoin.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ff21113877dd79ed7913b57/64f9ca2a17a7b9c27c480c99_Group%206056.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ff21113877dd79ed7913b57/64f9ca3161c6e8a81f8e19a4_Group%206073.svg)
